definition: to disappear/to vanish/to eliminate/to spend (time)/have to/need
to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent

sentences.english: The curriculum includes a lesson from the firemen on how to rappel from a building.
sentences.chinese: 其中的課程包括消防員教授如何用繩索從大樓上下來。

sentences.english: So many firefighters died that day.
sentences.chinese: 那天犧牲了許多消防員。

sentences.english: It appears to be a team-colored thermoplastic helmet, of the variety typically associated with firefighters.
sentences.chinese: 外型是頂根據隊伍決定顏色的熱塑性消防員頭盔。

sentences.english: One of the boys had to be rescued by firemen wearing breathing apparatus.
sentences.chinese: 其中一個男孩須由帶着呼吸裝置的消防員才能救出。

sentences.english: Either put in enough firemen to put the fire out or get out of the house.
sentences.chinese: 不派足消防員將火滅掉，那就讓他們撤出那房子。

sentences.english: The person who set the fire will likely face homicide charges for the deaths of two firefighters.
sentences.chinese: 由於兩名消防員犧牲，縱火者將面臨謀殺的指控。

sentences.english: Farmers water plants with it while firemen use it to put out fire.
sentences.chinese: 農民水生植物而消防員用它來撲滅火。

sentences.english: I like firefighters with love handle.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡有小肚子的消防員。

sentences.english: Yeah, I was a fireman for 32 years in London Fire Brigade.
sentences.chinese: 我在倫敦消防隊做了32年的消防員。

sentences.english: The fireman reeled the hosepipe out.
The firm fireman first overcame thirst desire.
sentences.chinese: 堅定的消防員首先克服口渴欲望。

sentences.english: Why do firemen need to carry oxygen supply when they go into the fire?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼當消防員進入火災之前要攜帶供氧器？

sentences.english: Chinese firefighters help students evacuate from a flooded school.
sentences.chinese: 中國的消防員幫助學生從學校裏轉移。

sentences.english: With great presence of mind a fireman pulled the driver away from the burning cab.
sentences.chinese: 一位消防員急中生智，將司機從燃燒的車裏拉出來。

sentences.english: A fireman jumped into the black water below to retrieve a comatose Fleming.
sentences.chinese: 消防員跳進黑漆的水中救出了已經昏迷的凱特。

sentences.english: Note that the teaser image shows a fireman holding a baby.
sentences.chinese: 看看這幅圖片，畫着一個消防員舉着一個嬰兒。

definition: to sound an alarm/to report sth to the police
to start out on a trip/to dispatch troops
to find/to track down/to recover (sth lost)
